summary: A group of suburban biker wannabes looking for adventure hit the open road, but get more than they bargained for when they encounter a New Mexico gang called the Del Fuegos.
cast: Tim Allen|John Travolta|Martin Lawrence|William H. Macy|Ray Liotta|Marisa Tomei|Kevin Durand|M.C. title: Cerdos salvajes: Con un par... de ruedas
